text: The Women's long distance events in cross-country skiing, 15 km classical for category standing and visually impaired and 10 km classical for sitting, were held on April 4 and 5 as part of the 2011 IPC Biathlon and Cross-Country Skiing World Championships. == Medals == {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | bgcolor=efefef|Class||width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Sitting |Colette Bourgonje '''' |Liudmila Vauchok '''' |Andrea Eskau '''' |- |Standing |Oleksandra Kononova '''' |Iuliia Batenkova '''' |Katarzyna Rogowiec '''' |- |Visually impaired |Elena Remizova Guide: Natalia Yakomova '''' |Mikhalina Lysova Guide: Alexey Ivanov '''' |Tatiana Ilyuchenko Guide: Valery Koshkin '''' |} ==Results== ===Sitting=== April 5 {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" !
